alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nassau, northeastern Duval, Camden, Glynn and southeastern Charlton Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Darien to near Kings Bay Base to near Nassau Village-Ratliff. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Fernandina Beach, Hilliard, Woodbine, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt and Dock Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
